page.title: 18Vandals in the Addingtons.
page.content: In Gt Addington bus shelter there is writing everywhere and rubbish scattered all over the place.There is writing engraved in the wood of the bus shelter.Someone has pulled the lid off the salt box and broken the public seat.Someone has vandalised Gt Addington telephone box by smashing six windows.At the moment the telephone directories are still there.In the Little Addington bus shelter there is writing everywhere.People climbed on the roof by way of a tree,which is now chopped down,but it has started to grow again.
